>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: INVALID PROPERTY VALUE

id:: td-000080

######################################################################

This test data file illustrates an entity with invalid property value.
Specifically, it contains a problem with a status value of `bogus'
which is not one of the allowed values.

>>>problem

title:: This is problem 1

label:: problem-1

type:: technical

status:: bogus

description:: There is no problem with problem 1.

<<<problem

<<<DOCUMENT
